metadata.title: Luca + Danni Filigree Hamsa Bangle Bracelet For Women Made in USA
features: FILIGREE HAMSA BANGLE: Put a halt to harmful energy. Our handcrafted Filigree Hamsa Bracelet brings you an abundance of lifeâ€™s essential elements: From happiness to health, prosperity to luck, this ancient emblem of protection represents the proverbial Hand of God across all creeds and faiths.

HAND WRAPPED IN THE USA WITH ARTISAN METALS: Womens bangle bracelet features a sculpted charm from artisan metals. Hand wrapped by skilled artists who put care into each bangle. The bracelet has a hook and catch closure making it both comfortable and easy to put on and take off.

FINISH AND SIZE: The regular bracelet is designed with an with an oval shape to ensure a proper fit. The bangle has a brass finish and measures 2.6 inches in width with a circumference of 7.5 inches with a hook and catch closure. Check sizing guide for details on accurately measuring for correct fit. This bracelet style is also available in petite size or silver tone.

GIFT WITH MEANING: This bangle is a perfect gift for you, your mother, sister, daughter or friend needing an everyday reminder of love. Great gift for Mother's Day, Christmas and birthdays! Packaged in a gift box with essence card.

Luca + Danni iconic, stacking bracelets are made in the USA and shaped to sit top of wrist so you can express the things that matter most to you. After our founder Fred lost his brother to cancer he returned to his family's 60+ year old jewelry manufacturing business and launched L+D to honor his memory and share his embrace the journey spirit.
description: Luca + Danni is an American made jewelry brand that was founded on the belief that we should all celebrate our own personal journey. Designed with intent, our iconic stacking bracelets are shaped to sit on the top of your wrist so you can express the things that matter most to you. Our founder, Fred Magnanimi, lost his younger brother to cancer. After that experience, Fred returned to his roots in his familys 60+ year old jewelry manufacturing business and launched Luca + Danni to honor his brothers memory. Sharing his "embrace the journey"spirit, we continue his family tradition of handcrafting empowering and effortless jewelry that is proudly born in the USA.
